column5: Put this up earlier but at the end of someones post, so I don't think many saw this. I laughed each time I replayed it.  http://www.fishingpixels.com/bill5.html
What I can't figure is how he got the boat there if there was no pin in the hitch.
I think many of Bill Dances bloopers are staged, but your right, funny stuff.
I'd much rather see one of his blooper reels than his fishin' show!
Oh yes... that one is a classic. one of my personal favourites is when he wrestles with his trolling motor. lolol http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SrA_kGB007U     -R-
